# WCPOS Documentation

> WCPOS is a free, open-source Point of Sale (POS) application for WooCommerce. It turns any WooCommerce-powered online store into a fully-featured retail POS system.

## Overview

WCPOS connects to your WooCommerce store and provides a modern, fast point-of-sale interface for in-person sales. It synchronises products, orders, customers, and inventory in real-time with your WordPress/WooCommerce backend.

## Platforms

WCPOS is available on:
- **Web**: Any modern browser at https://wcpos.com/pos
- **Desktop**: Windows, macOS (Intel & Apple Silicon), Linux
- **Mobile**: iOS (TestFlight), Android (Play Store)

## Key Features (Free)

- Real-time product search and barcode scanning
- Shopping cart with discounts, fees, and notes
- Customer management and lookup
- Cash and card payment tracking
- Receipt printing and email receipts
- Tax calculations (inherited from WooCommerce)
- Offline mode with local database sync
- Multi-language support (11 languages)

## Pro Features

- Custom payment gateway integrations (Stripe Terminal, SumUp, etc.)
- Multi-store support
- Priority support
- Receipt template customisation

## Technical Requirements

- WordPress (recent version)
- WooCommerce (recent version)
- PHP 7.4 or higher
- HTTPS/SSL certificate recommended

## How It Works

1. Install the WCPOS plugin on your WordPress site
2. Open the POS application (web, desktop, or mobile)
3. Connect to your store using your WordPress credentials
4. Start selling - products, customers, and orders sync automatically

## Documentation Structure

- **/getting-started** - Installation, setup, connecting to your store
- **/pos** - Product panel, cart, checkout interface
- **/products** - Product management, POS-only products, sync
- **/orders** - Order management and history
- **/customers** - Customer lookup and management
- **/payment** - Payment methods and custom gateways
- **/settings** - Store settings, WP Admin configuration
- **/support** - Troubleshooting, performance, logs
- **/error-codes** - Reference for all error codes
